title: Negotiate a Land Purchase Agreement
description: A developer is negotiating the purchase of a parcel of land for a future project.

tasks.description: Draft a purchase offer that includes a long due diligence period to allow time for feasibility studies and securing entitlements.
tasks.expected_outcome: The offer includes favorable terms for the developer.

tasks.description: Negotiate with the landowner's agent on price and the length of the due diligence/entitlement period.
tasks.expected_outcome: A purchase price and contingency period are agreed upon.

tasks.description: Finalize and execute the purchase and sale agreement.
tasks.expected_outcome: A binding contract to purchase the land is in place.
